name: Golden Rush - Assassin Hero
detailed_description:
Unlocking the Assassin hero.


Rhiannon, the noble killer. Each of the polises engaged in maritime trade in the Libre Sea is unique. Some are famous for their silk, some for their jewelry or seductive dancers. However, there's no other city as infamous as Tilamin, a city that hosts the Guild of Killers famous for their mastery all over the continent.
